horsentpmath

Interface Matrix

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Matrix2, Matrix3, Matrix4

    public interface Matrix
    A linear transformation on space.

    Inverse equations taken from here

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Matrix concatenate(Matrix matrix)
      Creates a new transform that is the concatenation of this Matrix and the given matrix.
      float get(int index)
      Gets the component of this matrix at the index.
      float getDeterminant() 
      Matrix getInverse() 
      int getOrder() 
      Matrix getTranspose() 
      void printMatrix()
      Prints this Matrix to System.out, good for debugging.
      void set(int index, float value)
      Sets the component of this Matrix at the index.
      Vector transform(Vector vector)
      Transforms the given vector by the transformation contained by this Matrix.

        Gets the component of this matrix at the index.

        Returns:

        Sets the component of this Matrix at the index.
        Parameters:

        value - the new value of the component

      • concatenate

        Matrix concatenate(Matrix matrix)
        Creates a new transform that is the concatenation of this Matrix and the given matrix.
        Parameters:
        matrix - the matrix to concatenate this matrix with.
        Returns:
        the concatenated transform.

      • transform

        Vector transform(Vector vector)
        Transforms the given vector by the transformation contained by this Matrix.
        Parameters:
        vector - the vector to transform.
        Returns:
        the transformed vector.
